text: there was a heavy exchange of fire
further north along this road and it
appears that the two suspects stole a
car from a town very close to the center
of yesterday's search and began driving
south towards Paris at that stage a car
chase ensued and it ended up in this
small town of de matar and in an
industrial estate on the edge of the
town where we now believe the the two
gunmen are holed up in the offices of a
small printing company at the French
news agency AFP it's quoting a police or
saying they believe there is one hostage
inside it's a company which has a small
workforce on an industrial estate other
people in the surrounding area have been
told to stay indoors naturally enough as
you say police have converged in huge
numbers on this area as we drove past
before we were probably wisely moved on
by the police we could see at least five
helicopters hovering over the area and
the concern of the police will really be
to try and get as many people to safety
as soon as possible and to try to bring
this situation to a quick and peaceful
end of course the the two gunmen are
armed they are described as very
dangerous for obvious reasons by the
police and it's not clear what their
next move is going to be
